dcterms:description: Kvasir-SEG is the first multi-class gastrointestinal illness dataset, consisting of 8,000 GI track photos from eight unique categories, each with 1,000 images. The segmented polyp dataset has been updated with 13 polyp class photos and new images to improve dataset quality.
dcterms:title: Kvasir-SEG

dcterms:creator: Youngwan Lee
Joong-won Hwang
Sangrok Lee
Yuseok Bae
Jongyoul Park
dcterms:description: CVC-ClinicDB is an open dataset containing 612 pictures from colonoscopy sequences, specifically designed for detecting adenomas in colonoscopy videos. The dataset includes polyp frames and ground truths, with masks corresponding to the regions covered by the polyps.
dcterms:title: CVC-ClinicDB

dcterms:creator: Xu Q
Duan W
He N
dcterms:description: ISIC2018 provides a dataset for skin lesion analysis, containing 2594 dermoscopic raw images and corresponding binary label images. The dataset includes various skin diseases such as melanoma, basal cell carcinoma, and others.
dcterms:title: ISIC2018
